name: arnahit.js
author: arnahit-co
description: ES6 JS Framework For Creating Cross Platform Applications based on jquery & bootstrap

scripts.build-android: echo build web application && npm run build-web && mkdir dist/android && cd dist/web && echo copying files... && cp -r * ../android
scripts.build-web: npm run web-start && npm run web-copy_main && npm run web-build-core  && npx babel ./app --out-dir dist/web/app --copy-files &&  npx babel resources/ --out-dir dist/web/resources --copy-files && cd dist/web && npm install
scripts.web-build-core: npm run web-build-core-arnahit && npm run web-build-core-dom && npm run web-build-core-components && npm run web-build-core-libraries && npm run web-build-core-src
